Stars, hide your fires
Let not light see
my black and deep desires
my sword of vengeance
shall draw blood
the dark samurai
Stars, hide your fires
Let not light see
my black and deep desires
my sword of vengeance
shall draw blood

Banku - A Samurai's Tale of vengeance

Banku Token Blood Red Paper Roadmap
01

Honor

"It's in every man's mind to love honor. The honor which men confer is not good honor. It's too often nothing higher than vain glory. Those whom my Lord ennobles, he can make common again."

I was trained to obey without question. I have dispatched brutality to the cause of my Lord, in the name of honor. But to cut down a pregnant girl?

02

Deserters

From some unknown plains the wind brought us together. Deserters of duty. Betrayers of sacred oaths and maxims.

Strangers united under one banner for survival and retribution. We ride hard and ambush evil lords of the lands. Rebels with a just cause. We strike fear in the fearless hearts of strong men.

03

Betrayal

I looked over all that I wrote down in the past spring and I'm certain our defacto leader is threatened by my charisma, and enticed by richies offered by my former lord.

The cues to betrayal are obvious to the leery. Men are bad at concealing intentions in anticipation of treachery. They overplay their act of normalcy. The cues likely to be missed are of a woman whose loyalty you think you've earned.

04

Ronin

The auditorium: an enormous half-globe of glass with the sun piercing through.

The circular rows of noble, globe-like, closely-shaven heads. With joy in my heart I looked around. I believe I was looking in the hope of seeing the rose-colored scythe, the dear lips of O-, somewhere among the blue waves of the unifs. Then I saw extraordinarily white, sharp teeth like the.... But no!
